file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1 info: title: Parking 🅿️ description: | ## Parking categories
**_Parking zones_** | Category | Category description (cs) | Category description (en) | | - | - | - | | zone_residential| rezidentní zóna (modrá) | residential area (blue) | | zone_visitors| návštěvnická zóna area (oranžová) | visitor area (orange) | | zone_mixed| smížená zóna area (fialová) | mixed area (purple) | | zone_other| iné | other | **_Parking lots_** | Category | Category description (cs) | Category description (en) | | - | - | - | | park_and_ride | P+R parkoviště | P+R parking | | park_paid_private | placené parkoviště | paid private parking | version: 1.0.0 tags: - name: Parking paths: /parking/: get: tags: - Parking summary: GET All Parking Spaces parameters: - name: latlng in: query description: Sorting by location (Latitude and Longitude separated by comma, latitude first). schema: type: string example: 50.124935,14.457204 - name: range in: query description: Filter by distance from latlng in meters (range query). Depends on the latlng parameter. schema: type: number example: 5000 - name: source in: query description: Filter by data provider. schema: type: string example: korid - name: sourceId in: query description: Filter by parking group id. Unique per data provider. schema: type: string example: 1 - name: category in: query description: Filter by parking type. Use with square brackets `category[]` style: form explode: false schema: type: array items: type: object example: park_and_ride - name: limit in: query description: Limits number of retrieved items. schema: type: number example: 10 - name: offset in: query description: Number of the first items that are skipped. schema: type: number example: 0 - name: x-access-token in: header description: e.g. YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN schema: type: string example: YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN responses: 200: description: OK content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: required: - type type: object properties: type: type: string features: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/FeaturePolygon' example: type: FeatureCollection features: - geometry: type: Polygon coordinates: - - - 14.4633 - 50.07827 - - 14.4633 - 50.07827 - - 14.4633 - 50.07827 - - 14.4633 - 50.07827 - - 14.4633 - 50.07827 - - 14.4633 - 50.07827 properties: id: 6 source: korid source_id: 33 data_provider: www.korid.cz name: Husova (u nemocnice) category: park_and_ride date_modified: "2020-05-18T07:38:37.000Z" address: null area_served: null payment_url: https://payment.com/link.html total_spot_number: 180 tariff_id: 20 valid_from: "2020-05-31T00:00:00.000Z" valid_to: "2022-05-31T00:00:00.000Z" type: Feature 403: description: Forbidden content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' example: error_message: Forbidden error_status: 403 /parking/{id}: get: tags: - Parking summary: GET Parking Space parameters: - name: id in: path description: Id of parking location. required: true schema: type: string example: 6 - name: x-access-token in: header description: e.g. YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN schema: type: string example: YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN responses: 200: description: OK content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: type: object properties: FeaturePolygon: $ref: '#/components/schemas/FeaturePolygon' properties: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ParkingSpace' example: geometry: type: Polygon coordinates: - - - 14.4633 - 50.07827 - - 14.4633 - 50.07827 - - 14.4633 - 50.07827 - - 14.4633 - 50.07827 - - 14.4633 - 50.07827 - - 14.4633 - 50.07827 properties: id: 6 source: korid source_id: 33 data_provider: www.korid.cz name: Husova (u nemocnice) category: park_and_ride date_modified: "2020-05-18T07:38:37.000Z" address: null area_served: null payment_url: https://payment.com/link.html total_spot_number: 180 tariff_id: 20 valid_from: "2020-05-31T00:00:00.000Z" valid_to: "2022-05-31T00:00:00.000Z" type: Feature 403: description: Forbidden content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' example: error_message: Forbidden error_status: 403 404: description: Not Found content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' example: error_message: Not Found error_status: 404 /parking/measurements: get: tags: - Parking summary: GET All Parking Spaces Measurements parameters: - name: source in: query description: Filter by data provider. schema: type: string example: korid - name: sourceId in: query description: Filter by parking group id. Unique per data provider. schema: type: string example: 1 - name: from in: query description: Date in ISO8601, limits data measured from this datetime. schema: type: string example: "2021-02-26T12:01:00.000Z" - name: to in: query description: Date in ISO8601, limits data measured up until this datetime. schema: type: string example: "2021-02-26T12:03:00.000Z" - name: limit in: query description: Limits number of retrieved items. schema: type: number example: 10 - name: offset in: query description: Number of the first items that are skipped. schema: type: number example: 0 - name: x-access-token in: header description: e.g. YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN schema: type: string example: YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN responses: 200: description: OK content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ParkingMeasurement' example: - id: 10168955 source: korid source_id: 20 available_spot_number: 5 closed_spot_number: 0 occupied_spot_number: 8 total_spot_number: 13 date_modified: "2021-02-26T12:02:46.188Z" 403: description: Forbidden content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' example: error_message: Forbidden error_status: 403 /parking/tariffs/: get: tags: - Parking summary: GET All Parking Spaces Tariffs parameters: - name: x-access-token in: header description: e.g. YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN schema: type: string example: YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN - name: source in: query description: Filter by data provider. schema: type: string example: korid required: false responses: 200: description: OK content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: type: array items: type: object example: - tariff_id: b184865e-5a5e-5465-abc1-4fab6bc56a77 source: korid last_updated: "2020-10-12T15:19:21+02:00" payment_mode: '""' payment_additional_description: Parkování Liberec free_of_charge: false url_link_address: https://parking.liberec.cz/ charge_band_name: A accepts_payment_card: true accepts_cash: false accepts_mobile_payment: false charge_currency: CZK allowed_vehicle_type: carSharing, taxi allowed_fuel_type: electricity, petrol, lpg charge: - charge: 20 charge_order_index: 0 charge_type: minimum charge_interval: 1800 max_iterations_of_charge: 1 min_iterations_of_charge: 1 start_time_of_period: Mon-Fri 09:00 end_time_of_period: Mon-Sun 14:30 403: description: Forbidden content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' example: error_message: Forbidden error_status: 403 404: description: Not Found content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' example: error_message: Not Found error_status: 404 /parking/tariffs/{tariffId}: get: tags: - Parking summary: GET Parking Space Tariff parameters: - name: tariffId in: path description: Id of parking tariff. required: true schema: type: string example: b184865e-5a5e-5465-abc1-4fab6bc56a77 - name: x-access-token in: header description: e.g. YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN schema: type: string example: YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN responses: 200: description: OK content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ParkingSpaceTariff' example: tariff_id: b184865e-5a5e-5465-abc1-4fab6bc56a77 source: korid last_updated: "2020-10-12T15:19:21+02:00" payment_mode: '""' payment_additional_description: Parkování Liberec free_of_charge: false url_link_address: https://parking.liberec.cz/ charge_band_name: A accepts_payment_card: true accepts_cash: false accepts_mobile_payment: false charge_currency: CZK allowed_vehicle_type: carSharing, taxi allowed_fuel_type: electricity, petrol, lpg charge: - charge: 20 charge_order_index: 0 charge_type: minimum charge_interval: 1800 max_iterations_of_charge: 1 min_iterations_of_charge: 1 start_time_of_period: Mon-Fri 09:00 end_time_of_period: Mon-Sun 14:30 403: description: Forbidden content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' example: error_message: Forbidden error_status: 403 404: description: Not Found content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' example: error_message: Not Found error_status: 404 components: schemas: Point: title: Point type: array minItems: 2 maxItems: 2 items: type: number example: - 14.4633 - 50.07827 Polygon: title: Polygon type: array minItems: 4 items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Point' Error: required: - error_message - error_status type: object properties: error_message: type: string example: Forbidden error_status: type: number example: 403 FeaturePolygon: title: Feature Polygon required: - geometry - properties - type type: object properties: geometry: required: - coordinates - type type: object properties: type: type: string coordinates: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Polygon' properties: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ParkingSpace' type: type: string Parkingcategory: title: Parking category type: string enum: - park_and_ride - park_paid_private - zone_residential - zone_visitors - zone_mixed - zone_other ParkingSpace: title: Parking Space required: - date_modified - id - name - source - source_id - total_spot_number type: object properties: id: type: string example: 6 source: type: string example: korid source_id: type: string example: 33 data_provider: type: string nullable: true example: www.korid.cz name: type: string example: Husova (u nemocnice) category: type: string nullable: true example: park_and_ride date_modified: type: string example: "2020-05-18T07:38:37.000Z" address: type: string nullable: true example: null area_served: type: string nullable: true example: null payment_url: type: string nullable: true example: https://payment.com/link.html total_spot_number: type: number example: 80 tariff_id: type: number nullable: true example: 20 valid_from: type: string nullable: true example: "2020-05-31T00:00:00.000Z" valid_to: type: string nullable: true example: "2022-05-31T00:00:00.000Z" ParkingMeasurement: title: Parking Measurement required: - available_spot_number - closed_spot_number - date_modified - id - occupied_spot_number - source - source_id - total_spot_number type: object properties: id: type: string example: 10168955 source: type: string example: korid source_id: type: string example: 20 available_spot_number: type: number example: 5 closed_spot_number: type: number example: 0 occupied_spot_number: type: number example: 8 total_spot_number: type: number example: 13 date_modified: type: string example: "2021-02-26T12:02:46.188Z" ParkingSpaceTariffCharge: title: Parking Space Tariff Charge required: - charge - charge_order_index type: object properties: charge: type: number example: 20 charge_order_index: type: number example: 0 charge_type: type: string nullable: true example: minimum charge_interval: type: number nullable: true example: 1800 max_iterations_of_charge: type: number nullable: true example: 1 min_iterations_of_charge: type: number nullable: true example: 1 start_time_of_period: type: string nullable: true example: Mon-Fri 09:00 end_time_of_period: type: string nullable: true example: Mon-Sun 14:30 ParkingSpaceTariff: title: Parking Space Tariff required: - charge_band_name - charge_currency - free_of_charge - last_updated - payment_mode - source - tariff_id - url_link_address type: object properties: tariff_id: type: string example: b184865e-5a5e-5465-abc1-4fab6bc56a77 source: type: string example: korid last_updated: type: string example: "2020-10-12T15:19:21+02:00" payment_mode: type: string example: "\"\"" payment_additional_description: type: string nullable: true example: Parkování Liberec free_of_charge: type: boolean example: false url_link_address: type: string example: https://parking.liberec.cz/ charge_band_name: type: string example: A accepts_payment_card: type: boolean nullable: true example: true accepts_cash: type: boolean nullable: true example: false accepts_mobile_payment: type: boolean nullable: true example: false charge_currency: type: string example: CZK allowed_vehicle_type: type: string nullable: true example: carSharing, taxi allowed_fuel_type: type: string nullable: true example: electricity, petrol, lpg charge: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ParkingSpaceTariffCharge'
